name: World Snake
description:
Controls:

[A] or [ARROW-LEFT] - Move left
[D]  or [ARROW-RIGHT] - Move right
[ESC] -  Pause (In web-version you also can pause with [P] or [PAUSE])

World Snake describes very well the overall game. It is a snake clone but on a planet. You play in it in the world of aliens. 

So the gameplay is really simple. Your Astronaut keeps on walking and behind him some aliens will spawn.

But they won't remain forever. Roughly said: if one alien is appearing then the alien on the very end will leave you.

You can increase the number of aliens following you by collecting bottles. 

Those bottles will spawn on random places all around the planet. You start with 10 bottles. But new bottles will first spawn when you've collected the 8 bottle in the world. 

When the game starts it is very important that you reach the first bottle to get points. 

With every second you will loose points. Reaching zero points => Game Over. 

You start with 5 points which means: you have 5 seconds to reach your first bottle. 

After you have collected your first bottles you probably don't have to be afraid anymore to run down to 0 points. Then it is more about trying to keep your score as high as possible. 

This game was made for the Dream Arcade Archive Game-Jam. I hope you enjoy it. Please give me feedback and let me know what you like and what could be improved. 

I also will provide all the assets I've created to make this game for free. 

And again special thanks to TallBeard's Music loop bundle. This is now the second game where I make use of his tracks and I'm more than happy with it. His music is really providing a great atmosphere so that my game benefits a lot from it!  If you are looking for game music - I really can recommend his work.
